segments.text: Namaskar, main hoon Bhagyashree. Apne wellness journey ke dauraan aur har umr ke logon se baatcheet karte hue
maine yeh mehsoos kiya ki hum aksar un chhoti-chhoti baaton ko nazarandaaz kar dete hain
jo hamare rozmarra ki jindagi ko aur wellbeing ko prabhavit karti hain jaise ki allergies.
Aisi hi ek condition hai Allergic Rhinitis.
Yeh duniya mein karodon logon ko affect karti hai
fir bhi log sayad ise samjh nahi pate ya toh fir iska ilaaj nahi kiya jaata.
